eventID

private int eventID
The type of the event.

dicomObject

private org.dcm4che.data.Dataset dicomObject
The DICOM object to process next. Only valid for NEXT_OBJECT_EVENT events.

actualValue

private int actualValue
The actual index of the processed object in the list of all objects to process. Only valid for PROGRESS_EVENT events.

maxValue

private int maxValue
The number of objects in the list of objects to process. Only valid for PROGRESS_EVENT events.

setStartingEvent

public void setStartingEvent()
This event should be send before processing the first DICOM object.

setNextObjectEvent

public void setNextObjectEvent(org.dcm4che.data.Dataset ds)
This event should be send for each DICOM object before processing the object in the plugin chain.

Parameters:
ds - the next DICOM object to process as a Dataset.

setFinishedEvent

public void setFinishedEvent()
This event should be send after processing the last DICOM object.

setProgressEvent

public void setProgressEvent(int actual,
                             int max)
If the total number of objects to process is known, this event should be send for each DICOM object before processing the object in the plugin chain.

Parameters:
actual - the actual index of the processed object in the list of all objects to process.
max - the number of objects in the list of objects to process.
